title: Who is Ali Larijani? Khamenei’s trusted adviser and key figure in Iran’s leadership
summary_full: Following Supreme Leader Khamenei's killing, Iran's top security official Ali Larijani vowed retaliation against the US and announced plans for a transitional leadership council. Larijani, a powerful figure with extensive experience, will oversee the immediate political management and security response during this critical juncture for the Islamic Republic.
